item.title: 我需要接触印度 "的情绪催热了大宗交易和首次公开募股计划
item.description: 在经历了几个月的沉闷之后，印度的股票销售市场正在升温，因为公司和股东们都在活跃的股市中套现。【原文：India’s market for share sales is warming up after a several dull months, as companies and shareholders cash in on a buoyant stock market.】

item.title: 外国投资者以创纪录的速度涌入韩国债券市场
item.description: 5 月份，外国投资者以创纪录的速度加快了购买韩国债券的步伐，这凸显出在总统大选前夕以及在将韩国债券纳入主要全球指数之前，投资者对该资产类别的需求日益增长。【原文：Foreign investors accelerated purchases of South Korean bonds at a record pace in May, highlighting growing appetite for the asset class in the run-up to the presidential election and ahead of the addition to a major global index.】

item.title: 东非财政部长在预算中面临财政困境
item.description: 东非各国财政部长将在周四公布支出计划，届时他们将走钢丝，债务膨胀、收入表现不佳和地缘政治都将给财政整顿计划带来挑战。【原文：East African finance ministers will be walking a tightrope when they reveal their spending plans on Thursday, with ballooning debt, underperforming revenue and geopolitics challenging planned fiscal consolidation.】

item.title: 首席执行官担心滞胀，CDPQ 寻求削减美国资产
item.description: Caisse de Dépôt et Placement du Québec（魁北克储蓄与配售基金）负责人表示，经过多年的增长和丰厚的回报，该基金是时候缩减对美国的投资了。【原文：The head of Caisse de Dépôt et Placement du Québec said it’s time for the fund to scale back on US investments after years of growth and great returns.】

item.title: 新世界债券持有人希望更多地披露融资计划
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. bondholders are growing frustrated with the level of financial disclosure by the cash-strapped developer as it prioritizes communication with banks during critical loan talks.】

item.title: 韩国股票套期保值成本降低，看涨押注金额达 32 亿美元
item.description: 韩国上周的总统选举引发了四年多来最大的股市暴涨。期权交易商们押注，未来还会有更多。【原文：South Korea’s presidential election last week has sparked the biggest equity surge in more than four years. Options traders are betting there’s more to come.】

item.title: 中国股市较香港股市溢价降至五年来最低点
item.description: 中资股相对于在香港交易的同类股票的溢价已降至五年来的最低点，这表明一些投资者可能希望抢购价格变得更低的在岸股票。【原文：The premium that Chinese stocks command over their Hong Kong-traded peers has narrowed to a five-year low, suggesting that some investors may look to snap up onshore stocks that have become cheaper.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧再度升温，美元延续跌势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将很快通知贸易伙伴单方面征收关税的税率，这加剧了市场对美国关税的担忧，美元兑主要同业货币延续跌势。【原文：The dollar extended its decline versus major peers as worries over US tariffs increased after President Donald Trump said he would notify trading partners soon of unilateral levy rates.】

item.title: 全球基金回流，但美国最大的印度主题 ETF 资金继续外流
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Citadel Securities 聘请千禧年的 Narang 加入亚洲首席运营官团队
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士表示，肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的做市商巨头 Citadel Securities LLC 已聘请 Mayank Narang 为其亚洲首席运营官团队成员，以应对该地区的扩张。【原文：Ken Griffin’s market-making giant Citadel Securities LLC has hired Mayank Narang for its Asia chief operating officer team amid expansion in the region, said a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本企业的经营环境因关税打击而恶化
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面关税政策对关键行业造成了冲击，日本最大的企业一年多来首次转为悲观，这一事态发展可能会使日本央行的政策路径复杂化。【原文：Japan’s largest businesses turned pessimistic for the first time in more than a year as Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs upended key sectors, a development that could complicate the Bank of Japan’s policy path.】

item.title: 斯佩林认为中美贸易紧张局势将持续，未来将出现波动
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司的吉恩-斯珀林（Gene Sperling）认为，尽管最近在关税问题上出现了解冻，但中美之间的贸易紧张局势不太可能很快得到缓解，他警告说，市场波动可能会持续下去。【原文：Trade tensions between the U.S. and China are unlikely to ease soon despite a recent thaw on tariffs, according to Gene Sperling of Pacific Investment Management Co., who warns market volatility is likely to persist.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀预期升至 2023 年以来最高点
item.description: 墨尔本研究所发布的一项调查显示，澳大利亚 6 月份的预期通胀率升至 5.0%，为 2023 年 7 月以来的最高水平。【原文：Australia’s expected inflation rate rose to 5.0% in June, the highest level since July 2023, according to a survey released by the Melbourne Institute.】

item.title: 中国可能因煤炭过剩而放弃印尼的低品位煤炭
item.description: 中国很可能会削减最低等级煤炭的进口量，因为煤炭供应过剩使煤炭贸易变得不经济，而且政府也在收紧碳排放。【原文：China is likely to cut imports of the lowest grades of coal as a glut of the fuel makes the trade uneconomic and the government tightens up on carbon emissions.】

item.title: 特朗普的汽车关税打击了日本经济的核心
item.description:
丰田、本田、斯巴鲁和其他日本汽车制造商将面临超过 190 亿美元的利润损失，因为经济学家们预计经济将面临衰退风险，关键的工资周期也将受挫

。【原文：

Toyota, Honda, Subaru and other Japanese carmakers brace for a profit hit of more than $19 billion as economists flag the risk of a recession and a setback for key wage cycle

】

item.title: 库什-塔德（Couche-Tard）认为 "通往七家工厂的道路畅通无阻"；与美国商店达成撤资协议
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.称，几家潜在买家已提出收购美国便利店的建议，这些便利店与 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. said several potential buyers have made proposals to acquire convenience stores in the US that overlap with Seven & i Holdings Co., showing progress toward a deal that could help the Canadian retailer win regulatory approval for its proposal to buy its Japanese rival.】

item.title: 中国自 2023 年以来首次发行私人建造美元债券
item.description: 中国少数几家尚未违约的大型私营开发商之一--海泉集团有限公司（Seazen Group Ltd.）开始销售美元债券，这将是两年多来的首笔此类债券。【原文：Seazen Group Ltd., one of the few major private-sector Chinese developers yet to default, started marketing a dollar bond that would be the first of its kind in more than two years.】

item.title: 东邦钛业股价因 JX 金属公司考虑撤资而跳涨
item.description: 东邦钛业公司（Toho Titanium Co. Ltd.）的母公司 JX Advanced Metals Corp. 表示，随着日本复杂的子公司体系受到审查，该公司正在考虑如何解除钛业部门的上市计划，随后该公司股价大涨。【原文：Toho Titanium Co. shares surged after parent JX Advanced Metals Corp. said it’s considering ways to unwind the listing of the titanium unit as Japan’s complex system of subsidiaries comes under scrutiny.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普对与金正恩通信持开放态度
item.description: 白宫在其最新评论中表示，尽管金正恩没有发出寻求接触的明显信号，但美国总统唐纳德-特朗普仍愿意与朝鲜领导人金正恩进行沟通。【原文：President Donald Trump remains open to communications with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, the White House said in its latest comments expressing willingness to resume dialogue with the nuclear-armed North, despite no visible signal from Kim seeking engagement.】

item.title: 牛津资本称中国中盘股将在人工智能热潮中茁壮成长
item.description: Ox Capital Management Pty Ltd 的基金经理表示，随着企业利用人工智能的进步，中国中型股将是下一个赢家。【原文：Chinese mid-cap stocks will be the next winners as companies take advantage of advancements in artificial intelligence, according to a fund manager at Ox Capital Management Pty Ltd.】

item.title: 新西兰威利斯批评新西兰央行对奥尔辞职的处理方式
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）批评了储备银行对前行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）辞职的处理方式，称储备银行本应更透明地说明奥尔辞职的原因。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis has criticized the Reserve Bank for its handling of former governor Adrian Orr’s resignation, saying it should have been more transparent about his reason for quitting.】

item.title: 印度央行出人意料的举措释放出矛盾信号
item.description: 印度央行在新行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）的领导下，在采取积极措施刺激经济增长和贷款的同时，也向市场参与者发出了相互矛盾的货币政策信号。【原文：India’s central bank under new Governor Sanjay Malhotra is giving market participants conflicting signals about monetary policy as it takes aggressive steps to spur economic growth and lending.】

item.title: 英伟达和三星计划投资机器人初创公司 Skild AI
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）和英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）将持有 Skild AI 公司的少数股份，以加强它们在新兴消费机器人行业的工作。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and Nvidia Corp. will take minority stakes in Skild AI Inc. as they seek to bolster their work in the emerging consumer robotics industry.】

item.title: 橡树树的马克斯说特朗普重视不可预测性，请谨慎行事
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）表示，投资者应预计美国总统唐纳德-特朗普执政期间将持续存在不确定性，而全球市场相对较高的估值也要求投资者持谨慎态度。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks said investors should expect uncertainty to endure under US President Donald Trump and relatively high valuations in global markets require a cautious stance.】

item.title: 黄金因中东紧张局势和特朗普关税承诺而上涨
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势加剧，黄金连续第二天上涨，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将在两周内向贸易伙伴通报关税税率，这也支持了黄金的避风港地位。【原文：Gold gained for a second day on increased tensions in the Middle East, with its haven status also supported by President Donald Trump’s comments that he will inform trading partners on tariff rates within two weeks.】

item.title: 即使收益率创历史新低，资金仍大量涌入东南亚债券市场
item.description: 尽管东南亚主权债券的收益率创下了历史新低，但投资者仍对这些债券趋之若鹜，原因是投资者远离美国资产，并押注该地区将进一步降息。【原文：Investors are making a beeline for Southeast Asian sovereign bonds despite their record low yields amid a shift away from US assets and on bets for further interest-rate cuts in the region.】

item.title: 亚洲物价下跌为降息和美国经济分化铺平道路
item.description: 随着食品和燃料价格下降以及当地货币对美元汇率走强推低了成本，整个亚洲的通胀正在放缓。在美国关税风险和相关不确定性对前景造成压力的情况下，这为该地区的央行行长们提供了支持其依赖贸易的经济体的空间。【原文：Inflation is easing across Asia as lower food and fuel prices and stronger local currencies against the dollar push down costs. That’s giving the region’s central bank chiefs scope to support their trade-reliant economies as the risk of US tariffs and related uncertainty weigh on the outlook.】

item.title: 日本 6 月信贷销售创下多年来最繁忙纪录，买家纷纷寻求风险投资
item.description: 日本借款人在 6 月份售出的公司债券数量已经超过了 4 年来任何一个 6 月份的售出量，而本月还未过半。【原文：Japanese borrowers have already sold more corporate bonds than they have for any June in four years, and the month isn’t even halfway through.】

item.title: 特朗普再次表示将在两周内制定单边关税措施
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他打算在未来一到两周内致函贸易伙伴，在7月9日对数十个经济体重新征收更高关税的最后期限到来之前，确定单边关税税率。【原文：President Donald Trump said he intended to send letters to trading partners in the next one to two weeks setting unilateral tariff rates, ahead of a July 9 deadline to reimpose higher duties on dozens of economies.】

item.title: 市场降温，英国房价指标降至 10 个月低点
item.description: 备受关注的英国房地产价格指数跌至近一年来的最低点，表明在购房者减税政策到期后，房地产市场仍面临压力。【原文：A closely watched index of UK property prices declined to its lowest in almost a year, suggesting the housing market remains under pressure after a tax break for buyers expired.】
